content:
TITLE: Installing Kinobi via npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Kinobi package using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install @metaplex-foundation/kinobi
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating and Rendering a Kinobi Tree in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to create a Kinobi instance, update the tree using visitors, and render it as a Umi-compatible JavaScript library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { createFromIdls, renderJavascripVisitor } from "@metaplex-foundation/kinobi";

// Instantiate Kinobi.
const kinobi = createFromIdls([
  path.join(__dirname, "idls", "my_idl.json"),
  path.join(__dirname, "idls", "my_other_idl.json"),
]);

// Update the Kinobi tree using visitors...

// Render JavaScript.
const jsDir = path.join(__dirname, "clients", "js", "src", "generated");
kinobi.accept(renderJavascriptVisitor(jsDir));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Generated Types and Serializers in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to use the types and serializers generated by Kinobi for a custom type, account, and instruction.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
const serializer: Serializer<MyTypeArgs, MyType> = getMyTypeSerializer();
serializer.serialize(myType);
serializer.deserialize(myBuffer);

// For accounts.
type Token = Account<TokenAccountData>;
type TokenAccountData = {...};
type TokenAccountDataArgs = {...};
const tokenDataSerializer = getTokenAccountDataSerializer();

// For instructions.
type TransferInstructionData = {...};
type TransferInstructionDataArgs = {...};
const transferDataSerializer = getTransferInstructionDataSerializer();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Account Helpers in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Examples of using the various account helper methods generated by Kinobi for fetching, deserializing, and querying accounts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
deserializeMetadata(rawAccount); // -> Metadata

await fetchMetadata(umi, publicKey); // -> Metadata or fail
await safeFetchMetadata(umi, publicKey); // -> Metadata or null

await fetchAllMetadata(umi, publicKeys); // -> Metadata[], fails if any account is missing
await safeFetchAllMetadata(umi, publicKeys) // -> Metadata[], filters out missing accounts

await getMetadataGpaBuilder()
  .whereField('updateAuthority', updateAuthority)
  .selectField('mint')
  .getDataAsPublicKeys() // -> PublicKey[]

getMetadataSize() // -> number

findMetadataPda(umi, seeds) // -> Pda
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Transaction Builders in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Examples of creating and combining transaction builders for instructions generated by Kinobi.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
await transfer(umi, { from, to, amount }).sendAndConfirm();

await transfer(umi, { from, to: destinationA, amount })
  .add(transfer(umi, { from, to: destinationB, amount }))
  .add(transfer(umi, { from, to: destinationC, amount }))
  .sendAndConfirm();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Data Enum Helpers in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Demonstration of how to use the helper functions generated for data enums to create and check enum variants.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
message('Quit'); // -> { __kind: 'Quit' }
message('Write', ['Hi']); // -> { __kind: 'Write', fields: ['Hi'] }
message('Move', { x: 5, y: 6 }); // -> { __kind: 'Move', x: 5, y: 6 }
isMessage('Quit', message('Quit')); // -> true
isMessage('Write', message('Quit')); // -> false
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Umi Plugin for Generated Client
DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a Umi plugin to register the programs defined by the generated client.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
export const mplTokenMetadata = (): UmiPlugin => ({
  install(umi) {
    umi.programs.add(createMplTokenMetadataProgram(), false);
  },
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing umi-rpc-web3js package via npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @metaplex-foundation/umi-rpc-web3js package using npm. This package provides an RPC implementation for Umi that integrates with Solana's web3.js.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/packages/umi-rpc-web3js/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
npm install @metaplex-foundation/umi-rpc-web3js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Program and Error Helpers in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Examples of using the program and error helper functions generated by Kinobi for a specific program.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/docs/kinobi.md#2025-04-18_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
MPL_TOKEN_METADATA_PROGRAM_ID; // -> PublicKey

createMplTokenMetadataProgram(); // -> Program

getMplTokenMetadataProgram(umi); // -> Program

getMplTokenMetadataProgramId(umi); // -> PublicKey

export class UpdateAuthorityIncorrectError extends ProgramError {
  readonly name: string = 'UpdateAuthorityIncorrect';

  readonly code: number = 0x7; // 7

  constructor(program: Program, cause?: Error) {
    super('Update Authority given does not match', program, cause);
  }
}

getMplTokenMetadataErrorFromCode(0x7, program); // -> UpdateAuthorityIncorrectError
getMplTokenMetadataErrorFromName('UpdateAuthorityIncorrect', program); // -> UpdateAuthorityIncorrectError
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Version 1.0.0 Changes in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the changes for version 1.0.0 of the package, which is a major release.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/packages/umi-serializers-core/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 1.0.0

### Major Changes

- [`d50553a`](https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/commit/d50553a419b7c9beac996a7c0b4d5942c91b5b4e) Thanks [@blockiosaurus](https://github.com/blockiosaurus)! - Release 1.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing wrapNullish Function in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the implementation of the wrapNullish function, which wraps a nullish value (null or undefined) into an Option type. It returns 'some(nullish)' if the value is neither null nor undefined, otherwise it returns 'none<T>()'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/packages/umi-options/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: TypeScript
CODE:
```
export const wrapNullish = <T>(nullish: Nullish<T>): Option<T> =>
  nullish !== null && nullish !== undefined ? some(nullish) : none<T>();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing wrapNullable Function in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the implementation of the wrapNullable function, which wraps a nullable value into an Option type. It returns 'some(nullable)' if the value is not null, otherwise it returns 'none<T>()'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/packages/umi-options/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: TypeScript
CODE:
```
export const wrapNullable = <T>(nullable: Nullable<T>): Option<T> =>
  nullable !== null ? some(nullable) : none<T>();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Markdown Changelog Update - Version Changes
DESCRIPTION: Markdown-formatted changelog documenting version updates and dependency changes in the Umi project, including both minor and patch changes
SOURCE: https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/blob/main/packages/umi-storage-mock/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

### Patch Changes

  - @metaplex-foundation/umi-core@0.2.2

## 0.2.1

### Patch Changes

- Updated dependencies [[`d28f4dc`](https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/umi/commit/d28f4dc05c45f35a429fa818e060aed648778718)]:
  - @metaplex-foundation/umi-core@0.2.1

## 0.2.0

### Minor Changes
